['Contribute to ongoing improvement and continuous support of our Salesforce Health Cloud instance, as well as systems that are closely integrated with Salesforce.', 'Work daily as a part of our agile engineering team and Salesforce lead to evolve a sophisticated system architecture across all our offerings.', 'Partner closely with key stakeholders, including product team, internal clinical employees, data and technology teams and end-users to develop a roadmap for Lifesprk’s Provider Portal built on Health Cloud.', 'Work in concert with the Salesforce development team and the broader Engineering Team to design, implement, test and deploy improvements utilizing all that Salesforce has to offer. We choose the right tool and approach for the right job.', 'Continuously collaborate with your team to evaluate and understand new and upcoming Salesforce features and technology to ensure that the Lifesprk Platform remains as relevant and fully featured as is possible.', 'Assist in increasing User adoption by acting as a resource for Salesforce training and issue resolution.', 'Ingesting 3rd party data and applying the latest data science methods in order to generate actionable insights.', 'Building out custom applications for our care team in both Salesforce and the web to serve our staff, members families, and their greater support team. What else can we leverage Salesforce for?', 'Developing an insights engine that becomes smarter the more we use it. How can we leverage SF Einstein?', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline or equivalent technology industry experience required.', 'Salesforce Admin Certification or Salesforce Application Builder Certification required, multiple certifications a plus (Advanced Admin and/or Dev 1).', '3+ years of professional experience in the Salesforce ecosystem.', 'Experience with Salesforce Sales Cloud and/or Service Cloud required; experience with Salesforce Health Cloud a plus.', 'A strong understanding of the Salesforce security and access architecture (profiles, permission sets, record types, etc.).', 'Hands-on configuration, workflow, process builder, flow experience; Apex, Lightning Web Components or Visualforce experience a plus but not required. A willingness to learn and understand the capabilities of Lightning Web Components required.', 'Experience leading and implementing the charge within the Salesforce ecosystem, including SDLC and Agile experience.', 'A commitment to testing and quality. Come teach us a thing or two about your testing approach.', 'A bias toward action. You love to push things forward and find creative ways to work around blockers.', 'A positive and energetic attitude that thrives when solving unique and difficult problems.', 'Experience as a remote teammate- come help us do it right as we commit to crushing remote.', "Willingness and ability to travel and to provide off-hours support - we need to get together every once in a while and see each other's smiling faces!"]

['Pioneer a new implementation of Einstein Analytics', 'Identify, design, and implement new dashboards and data flows inside Salesforce', 'Investigate and design new methods of bringing external data into Salesforce', 'Advocate and strategize ways for Sales to move faster and more efficiently', 'Collaborate with Sales Strategy, Engineering, and BI teams to align on data standards and principles', 'Partner with data and analytics experts to strive for enabling optimal efficiency', 'Innovate new and improved capabilities within our data systems', '4+ years working in Strategy & Operations, Analytics, Engineering and/or Consulting', '1+ years experience with SFDC and Einstein Analytics (EA Badges and superbadges are a plus!)', 'Experience providing mentorship, coaching, and technical guidance to others.', 'Passion for improving data processes, quality, structure, and accessibility.', 'Advanced SQL or SAQL knowledge', 'Curiosity and passion for problem solving and leveraging data to develop insights.', 'Experience building and delivering proof of concepts.', 'Effective communicator who is able to explain technical concepts in a simple way to non-technical audiences', 'High level of energy, enthusiasm, and commitment to performance and learning new skills.', 'Einstein Analytics, Tableau or equivalent dashboard building experience to create impactful reports, visualizations, and interactive dashboards.', 'Salesforce certifications like Administrator, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Einstein Analytics or Integration Architecture.', 'Familiarity with quality assurance and testing frameworks.', 'Experience in a fast paced, rapidly evolving startup environment with the ability to work under pressure and consistently revise approaches in response to new demand.']

['Analyze complex member data stored in relational databases, flat files, star schema’s, etc. (CRM systems, Claims data, Telephony Systems, etc.) and turn into actionable insights in support of the long and short-term goals of the company', 'Interpret complex analytic/reporting requirements from business stakeholders; write queries to pull, transform, and aggregate member transactional level data to provide insights to the organization', 'Write complex queries in SQL and other programming languages in support of reporting and analytics analyses', 'Integrate data from a variety of disparate sources, many times when there are no join keys between each source and need to rely on soft “fuzzy” joins', 'Build Intelligent and Interactive Dashboards and Reporting Solutions in Salesforce Einstein in support of various needs for analytics and insights across the organization', 'Dig into raw data to ascertain where the holes are, what doesn’t make sense, and suggest ways for cleansing and/or processing the data to make cleaner', 'Application of knowledge of structured data (join types, inner, outer), understanding of when tables should/shouldn’t have duplicates', 'Prepare, clean, aggregate and interpret big data (billions+ rows) in support of advanced analytic and reporting projects across the organization', 'Adhere to all confidentiality and HIPAA requirements as outlined within ConsumerMedical’s Operating Policies and Procedures in all ways and at all times with respect to any aspect of the data handled or services rendered in the undertaking of the position', 'Fulfill those responsibilities and/or duties that may be reasonably provided by ConsumerMedical for the purpose of achieving operational and financial success of the Company', "A Bachelor's Degree or higher in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Engineering, Actuarial, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or similar field required; ['NOTE: Only GC & Citizens on W2', 'As a Senior Salesforce Engineer - you will work collaboratively across teams and/or independently to design and build solutions on the Salesforce Force.com platform, including Web Services APIs, Apex, and Visualforce.', 'Provide guidance on solution requirements, technical design, integration architecture, and solution recommendations.', 'Implement new enhancements including creation of custom objects, workflows, validation rules, approval processes, flows, flow triggers and email alerts.', 'Integrate Salesforce with other platforms, and develop an understanding of other key applications within the organization.', 'Implementation change control from development sandboxes to production and across the development lifecycle. using Google Tag Manager', 'Experience administering and working with GA360 in an enterprise or multi-domain environment', 'Expert-level knowledge of capabilities of GA360 and GTM', 'Deep ['As a Senior Salesforce Engineer - you will work collaboratively across teams and/or independently to design and build solutions on the Salesforce Force.com platform, including Web Services APIs, Apex, and Visualforce.', 'Provide guidance on solution requirements, technical design, integration architecture, and solution recommendations.', 'Implement new enhancements including creation of custom objects, workflows, validation rules, approval processes, flows, flow triggers and email alerts.', 'Integrate Salesforce with other platforms, and develop an understanding of other key applications within the organization.', 'Implementation change control from development sandboxes to production and across the development lifecycle. Ensure that all necessary changes are documented, reviewed, tested, and approved before being deployed.', 'Develop reports, custom report types, dashboards, and processes to continuously monitor data quality and integrity.', 'Assist other resources within the team as needed.', 'Serve as a subject matter expert on items related to Salesforce.com, third party integrations, and AppExchange.', 'Remain current on new Salesforce features and functionality and providing recommendations for process improvements.', 'Possess a strong analytical and communication skills, both written and verbal.', 'Prioritize tasks, manage time effectively and work on projects/activities in parallel.', 'Minimum of at least 5+ years of software development experience with Salesforce.com, with strong proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, and SOQL, and an in depth understanding of SFDC Profiles/Roles and Sharing Rules, Validation Rules, Tasks, Workflow rules, and Triggers, etc.', 'Extensive understanding of the Salesforce.com data model and how and when to create custom objects, junction objects, and other model items.', 'Experience with the Salesforce.com APEX data loader and other data loading tools.', 'Experience with Salesforce.com Web Services APIs - SOAP and REST-based Web Service APIs, including consumption, request packaging, parsing\\de-serializing, managing static values, and UI\\UX elements for working with data in returned API response payloads.', 'Demonstrated experience with integrating solutions between SFDC and external systems.', 'Detailed understanding of the Salesforce classic, Salesforce Lightning and Salesforce sandbox platform development environments, with Financial Services Cloud experience a plus.', 'Experience with Einstein Analytics, Einstein Discovery, and Marketing Cloud are all a plus.', 'Experience in Financial Services / Wealth Management is a plus.', 'Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team oriented fast paced, dynamic environment, with an acumen for helping to raise the bar for overall team performance.', 'Experience with deployment/build/migration process in a Salesforce environment and associated tools.', 'Experience working in an agile delivery environment a plus.', 'Understanding of the banking or wealth industry', 'Experience with Financial Services Cloud', 'Appropriate Salesforce Certifications required']

['Translate business requirements into well-designed solutions that best leverage the Salesforce platform and products', 'Participate in technical design sessions; develop technical solution documentation aligned with the business objectives', 'Develop, test, and document custom development, integrations, and data migration elements of a Salesforce implementation', 'Develop custom solutions and interfaces on top of the Salesforce platform', 'Execute test plans to ensure quality delivery', 'Follow coding standards and participate in code reviews during projects to ensure appropriate design patterns are followed', 'Provide estimates and work breakdown structures for assigned tasks', 'Absorb new product and technical capabilities from Salesforce during new product releases', 'Minimum 4 years of Salesforce platform experience with strong software design and coding skills on Salesforce platform.', 'Understanding of the Salesforce product suite including Salesforce1, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, App Cloud, Communities and AppExchange solutions·', 'Extensive development experience using Lightning Aura and Web Components, Apex controllers, Triggers, Batch Apex, and other programmatic solutions on the Salesforce platform', 'Experience integrating with external systems via REST/SOAP, Streaming API and ETL solutions', 'Configuration experience using the Salesforce point-and-click application administration interface', 'Ability to perform automated testing and write unit tests', 'Familiarity with agile software delivery methodologies and tools such as Scrum, Jira, Rally or Agile Accelerator', 'Excellent client-facing written and oral communications skills', 'Active Salesforce certifications or ability to achieve relevant certifications upon hire', 'Preferred: Experience with Einstein Analytics and Mulesoft']

['Provide Salesforce Marketing (SFMC) technology expertise for solution design and technical implementation', 'Exception business and technical acumen. Ability to communicate effectively across client organizations including executives, stakeholders, product, and delivery organizations. Ability to communicate and lead internally across our multi-disciplinary and global structure.', 'Trusted Advisor. Adept at building trust with your customer through strategic thought, exceptional execution, and technical depth and expertise.', 'Lead and energize your teams and clients by providing thought leadership in modern hyper personalized omni-channel experiences.', 'Thought Leader. Contribute to PK published POVs, Whitepapers, Blog Posts, Webinars, and Speaking Engagements.', 'Travel is expected for this role: 60% (pre-COVID standard)', 'Technical Excellence. Ensure adherence to sound architecture and platform standards and best practices', 'Continuous Improvement. Driven to lead self, clients, and teams in a rhythm and appetite for leading modern digital marketing trends and technology. Stay in tune with latest Salesforce technology updates, changes, community, and roadmap(s). Improving and maintaining engineering guidelines', 'SFMC Center of Excellence. Drive and inspire the PK Way for developing and managing a CoE organization', 'GTM Strategy. Contribute to the definition and establishment of PKs market leading offerings addressing business and market challenges that inspire hyper-personalized digital experiences.', "Sales Engineering. Along-side PK Vertical Sales, provide broad expertise in strategic program direction and end-to-end solution architectures design, development, and continuous improvement of Salesforce Marketing Cloud solutions and underlying Salesforce ecosystem that power client's marketing and sales engines.", 'In a heavily client-facing pre-sales, or delivery kickstart role, accountable for big picture solution architecture and design. Will be expected to demonstrate business value and best practice Marketing Cloud solutions to clients', 'Certificate(s) in SFMC solutions', 'More than 10+ years of experience and good understanding of digital marketing concepts', 'Minimum 8 years hands-on platform experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud (i.e. Audience Studio DMP, Datorama, Interaction Studio, etc.)', 'Salesforce certification as a Marketing Cloud Architect', 'Minimum 4 years of experience in developing SQL with a RDBMS such as MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server', 'Minimum 4 years of experience with HTML, XML, CSS and JavaScript', 'Minimum 4 years of experience with SOAP APIs, REST APIs and integration techniques, strongly preferred', 'Knowledge of underlying Salesforce platform components – Einstein AI, Lightning, Heroku and strongly preferred', 'Past experience with object-oriented programming languages such as .NET or JAVA, Ruby, C#, C++, Python, preferred but not required', 'Experience with other marketing technologies and analytics tools (i.e. Adobe, Oracle, Sprinklr, Google, etc.) preferred but not required', 'Knowledge of Salesforce Sales Cloud, preferred but not required', 'Strong communication skills', 'Depending on location, the ability to travel up to 50% of the time']

['Serve as a lead technical designer/developer for Sales & Marketing applications, centred around the Salesforce.com platform; understand and communicate functionality, identify risks, manage change and design solutions that are scalable and cost-effective.', 'Partner with various product owners and stakeholders from Sales, Marketing, Services and Finance to implement and roll out new cloud applications, integrations and platform enhancements.', 'Collaborate with business teams, members of other IT departments and liaise effectively with external vendor development teams in the achievement of business objectives.', 'Gather, analyze and document technical requirements for new projects, enhancements to existing solutions and correction of production issues reported by end users.', 'Perform application configuration and deployment activities in Salesforce.com and other IT-supported platforms.', 'Work with middleware platforms to design, develop and deploy integration services which operate efficiently and accurately in a global environment. Experience with iPaaS platforms is preferable.', 'Participate in product/platform selection processes. Recommend build vs. buy when it comes to integrations with internal systems or external services.', 'Partner with business stakeholders to analyze, understand and improve sales & marketing operations to support employee productivity and customer success.', 'Design and document system data flows, integration mappings, object models, and other relevant technical aspects of the platform. Develop and maintain system documentation library.', 'Ability to design scalable enterprise solutions and write technical specifications and non-functional requirements for other team members and/or development partners.', 'Audit and enforce code development standards, sandbox strategies and implementation best practices. Perform code reviews throughout the development cycle and serve as mentor to junior staff.', 'Operate effectively using Agile and Scrum application development methodologies and support continuous improvement of technical delivery processes.', 'Ability to dive deep and research system issues, resolve user problems and escalate as necessary.', 'Assist in the creation and execution of unit, integration, regression and user acceptance test plans, including business use cases and generation of test data.', 'Support & execute change control best practices and ongoing management of internal SDLC processes along with promoting changes to production environments per established standards.', 'Must be flexible to engage on a wide spectrum of projects and exhibit capacity to quickly learn new skills & technologies when necessary.', 'Must possess an open mind to embrace new technologies, development techniques and project methodologies.', 'BS degree in Software Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science or equivalent work experience.', '5+ years of direct work experience in Salesforce/Force.com development, preferably supporting Sales & Marketing solutions, with 3+ years serving in a senior role.', 'Experience with leading and coordinating development efforts across a hybrid team of both internal and external developers residing in distributed locations.', 'Demonstrated understanding and proficiency in APEX language, triggers, controllers, components, Visual Force, Force.com SOAP/REST APIs, outbound messaging and JSON.', '3+ Years of Experience with client-side scripting (Javascript).', 'Solid understanding of object-oriented development concepts and design patterns.', 'Strong functional understanding of Salesforce.com usage within an integrated, full-cycle, lead-to-cash operational environment that is global in scale.', 'Prior design and development experience with Salesforce community sites and customer self-service portals is beneficial.', 'Previous experience in integrating Salesforce with Marketing Automation platforms is desirable. Working knowledge of Pardot is a plus.', 'Proven experience with enterprise-scale integration methodologies, platforms and techniques supporting data exchange to-and-from Salesforce.com. Prior integration development using the Dell Boomi platform is preferred.', 'Must be comfortable analyzing data, identifying trends and correcting data quality issues', 'Strong and effective written, verbal and presentation skills with the ability to collaborate with team members and business stakeholders at all levels of the organization.', 'Must be comfortable with juggling multiple priorities with the ability to manage time effectively.', 'Excellent problem-solving, analytical and investigative skills.', 'Achieved or working towards Platform Developer I / II certifications.', 'Development experience using Salesforce Lightning framework, Einstein Analytics and/or Heroku is beneficial.', 'Experience creating and executing unit, integration and user acceptance test plans is preferred.', 'Assist in the definition of business process models using best practice techniques, including current and future state solution design documentation.', 'Occasionally may be required to assist in the management of projects, including project plans, status meetings, progress reports and initiation/closure activities.', 'Experience operating within an Agile/Scrum software development methodology.', 'Prior usage of Agile project tracking tools such as JIRA, Confluence, etc. (or the like) is preferred.', 'Flexible PTO', 'Allocations for continuous learning & development', 'Health & wellness programs']

['Work as a member and lead teams to implement Tableau solutions for our customers.', 'Dashboard and Data Source development – develop dashboards and data sources that meet and exceed customer requirements.', 'Presentation skills – demonstrated ability to simplify complex situations and ideas and distill them into compelling and effective written and oral presentations.', 'Learn quickly – ability to understand and rapidly comprehend new areas, functional and technical, and apply detailed and critical thinking to customer solutions.', 'Some travel required (up to 10-20%).', '5+ years full-time experience with Tableau.', '5+ years of experience in a consulting role, working with Enterprise customers.', 'Ability to architect and scope complex projects.', 'B.S. or equivalent degree in computer science, statistics, mathematics or other relevant fields.', 'Certifications in Tableau or Salesforce highly preferred.', 'Experience with Tableau Server or Online preferred.', 'Experience with Salesforce and Einstein Analytics a plus.', 'Experience with Tableau Prep and/or Tableau Prep Conductor a plus.', 'Experience or equivalent coursework using statistics for data analysis with an understanding of, at a minimum, multivariate regression.', 'Strong understanding of SQL and basic understanding of programming languages; experience with SAQL, SOQL, Python, or R a plus.']

['Customize Salesforce with creation of custom objects, Lightning Components, workflows, email alerts.', 'Develop Responsive Lightning Components and Lightning Apps on salesforce platform.', 'Independently perform development, testing, implementation, documentation and updating as it relates to the SalesForce.com software and system administration.', 'Implement and rollout new Salesforce Org', 'Develop Mobile Apps for Salesforce and Apps for Outlook.', 'Perform quality assurance and unit testing on deliverables and work products.', 'Must be comfortable in rapidly changing and sometimes ambiguous work situations.', 'Keen attention to detail and complex problem-solving abilities from operational and technical perspective.', 'The ideal candidate will have at least 2+ years of experience in Salesforce.com, Lightning Components, VisualForce, Salesforce configurations, Apex classes, Apex Triggers, Apex Web services and APIs', 'Development Experience in HTML5, CSS', 'Previous communication skills and demonstrated ability to effectively communicate technical issues and resolve problems', 'Ability to analyze problems in detail and develop solutions', 'Self-sufficient, flexible, and motivated team player capable of managing several activities simultaneously', 'Energetic, enthusiastic and professional attitude', 'Experience in thinking through problems creatively.']

['This position provides opportunity to be involved several product developments:Learn Salesforce and Deploy solutions. Participate in implementing Customer Relationship Management using Salesforce and automate business processes for internal client organizations in the pursuit of their business objectives. Participate in requirements gathering, solutions design, systems configuration and development for a variety of Salesforce Modules such as Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Einstein Analytics / AI, Chat etc..Learn to execute projects through the PSEG’s Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and CMMI inclusive of identifying, specifying and analyzing business requirements and processes and managing progress throughout the application design, test and implementation process using Agile and 2 Pizza concepts.Work with Product teams in Two Pizza Team approach similar to Amazon product development and CICD model.Develop and implement process improvements, Next Best Actions, Automation opportunities, and Pro-active communications for customer care applications.Become a subject matter expert (aka Product Consultant) for technical and solution architecture that will include configuration, development, integration, and customization of complex Salesforce, and digital environments.Salesforce administration, release management, and deployment expertiseConfigure, Design, Develop using Visualforce, Apex, API, SOQL, Workflows, MuleSoft, and other development tools provided by PSEGOther:PSEG will not offer visa sponsorship in connection with these positions. Positions will be located in Newark, New Jersey in the PSEG General Office.Candidate must have a valid driver’s license and be willing to travel within the state and to PSEG LI locations.', 'PSEG will not offer visa sponsorship in connection with these positions. Positions will be located in Newark, New Jersey in the PSEG General Office.', 'Candidate must have a valid driver’s license and be willing to travel within the state and to PSEG LI locations.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Information/Computer Security, Computer or Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline i.e. STEM.•', 'IT Professional is a college entry-level position and requires a minimum 3.0 GPA and up to 1-1/2 years of experience. A Sr. Associate-IT Professional requires 1-1/2 years or more years of IT experience. Placement is dependent upon the candidate’s experience.•', 'Overall strong technical proficiency in information technology/computer disciplines•', 'Experience working with or related coursework in routing and switching, wireless networks and LANs, network security, hardware and operating systems, and Data communication systems•', 'Strong MS Office skills (i.e. Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Access)•', 'Self-starting with the demonstrated ability to learn new technical concepts quickly•', 'Detail oriented and demonstrated strong analytical and problem solving skills•', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills', 'Experience developing business process flows and soliciting business requirements•', 'Knowledge of testing methodologies and/or project management•', 'Familiarity with Cisco networking technologies and hardware•', 'Certifications in technical specialties such as Microsoft, Cisco, etc.•', 'Prior experience supporting a Windows environment•', 'Familiarity with Linux and Windows, and networking concepts such as IP networks•', 'Knowledge of Sarbanes Oxley controls', 'This is a multi-level position PSEG will not offer visa sponsorship in connection with these positions.']

other developers to design cohesive project strategies and ensure effective collaboration throughout all phases of development, testing and deployment', 'Maintain a flexible and proactive work 'Experience developing customer-facing user interfaces', '11-15 years’ BA experience', '11-15 years’ Software Development Lifecycle experience', '11-15 years’ requirements gathering and documentation', '11-15 years’ MS Office/PowerPoint experience', 'Bachelor’s degree in IT or related field or equivalent experience', '5 years Demonstrated Work Experience with SalesForce Platform as a developer', '5 years Demonstrated Work Experience with APEX Programming Language', '5 years Demonstrated Work Experience with VisualForce', '5 years’ Experience experience with SalesForce Security ['Provide day-to-day end-user second level support for Salesforce Users.', 'Develop end-user training documentation and assist Learning & Development to provide user training for new releases.', 'Build framework for user profiles, roles, permission sets, assignment rules, and license types.', 'Complete regular internal system audits and prepare for upgrades.', 'Identify, diagnose, and resolve technical problems, escalate and track problems appropriately.', 'Create and customize standard and custom objects including fields (including formula fields), page layouts, security rules, workflow and validation rules.', 'Customizations of reports, dashboards, workflows, process builder, flows, approval processes, outbound messages, knowledge.', 'Mobile and email process administration including design, implementation, training and support.', 'Monitor and improve data quality, integrity and user adoption.', 'Leverage expertise to collaborate on project governance and best practices/standards supporting the platform adoption and full application lifecycle (design, development, change control, UAT, deployment and support). Documents current and future state processes and develops functional specifications.', 'Assist with building of test plans, scenarios, and scripts to support QA/ UAT efforts.', 'Establish, implement, and administer best practices with regards to system maintenance, security, release management, improvements, data integrity, duplicates, backups, etc.', 'Promote data integrity, data governance, and compliance.', 'Performs special assignments as requested by departments.', 'Perform data loads and data quality reviews.', 'Develop and maintain SFDC Visual Force pages, Apex classes, triggers & lightning components.', 'Hands on experience with Tools like Data Loader.', 'College degree in Computer Science or similar discipline or equivalent work/technical experience.', 'Strong understanding of Salesforce platform: Financial Services Cloud, Shield, Pardot, & Einstein.', '2-3 years Salesforce administration experience, strong knowledge of Salesforce platform.', 'Experience completing several Salesforce.com integration and extension projects', 'Excellent communication and analytical skills.', 'Interact with business users-across all levels of the organization.', 'Facilitation or co-facilitate large cross-functional meetings including but not limited to JAD (Joint Application Development) sessions.', 'Ability to work independently, as well as part of a team.', 'Desire to interact with and help end users.', 'Hands on experience with Tools like Data Loader.', 'Advanced Excel skills and all MS Office applications.', 'Ability to reasonably estimate the time for tasks and then meet deadlines set by those estimates; ability to quickly and effectively prioritize multiple requests.', 'Experience with data management, transformation, cleaning, and de-duplication.', 'Understanding of relational databases such as SQL Server and data integration tools.', 'Best Practices understanding on coding standards, governance, deployment, Integrations, security implementations.', 'Must be bondable.']

['5+ years experience in a management role, customer-facing preferred, in a web-based software- or product-based company', 'Solid people management experience calling customer a team; responsible for hiring, scheduling, formal training, informal coaching, career development and performance management', 'Deep analytical skills – comfort with tools/processes needed for data-driven decision-making. Tools could include Looker, Tableau or Einstein', 'Solid project/program management skills', '3+ prior experience with SaaS applications like Salesforce, Zendesk, Cloud Coach (or other PSA) or Gainsight.', 'Focus on continuous improvement', 'Comfortable with a fast-paced, ambiguous environment – high-performing, adaptable, business-minded and highly accountable', 'Proactive, motivated, organized, team-oriented, professional', 'Patient, empathetic, and a unique ability to understand customer needs', 'Excellent communication skills and ability to distill key takeaways quickly, especially in a technical environment', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience", 'BE AN OWNER: Understand various data sources used in sales compensation calculations', 'NO SHENANIGANS: Collect, validate, analyze, manage sales compensation data to support commission processes and analyze sales performance results', "DON'T SETTLE: Automate commissions processing by connecting disparate data sources, developing and managing data models and creating scripts", 'BE INCLUSIVE: Collaborate with Operations, Finance, IT and other functions to implement,improve and automate data processes', 'WEAR THE CUSTOMERS SHOES: Support the team in calculating monthly, quarterly and annual payouts based on achievement', 'WRITE IT DOWN: Contribute to the development and improvement of systems to effectively capture, track and present compensation data.']

job_title: Digital Web and Einstein Analytics Business Analyst
job_text: ['Support the transition of our web analytics systems from Adobe Analytics to Google Analytics 360', 'Partner with Salesforce.com Cloud teams to recommend and implement changes to the data layer to improve data collection from the website', 'Assist analysts in generating deeper insights using GA360 features (e.g. multi-channel attribution, Big Query, advanced analysis, etc.) and setting up reports and dashboards using visualization tools like DataStudio and Tableau.', 'Own the technical design and development of the Google Analytics 360 SDK in mobile applications.', 'Assist with data integration between Google Analytics 360 and various Salesforce Clouds (Commerce, Community, Marketing and Analytics Clouds) as well as business intelligence tools such as Tableau and the Salesforce Analytics Cloud platform (Einstein Analytics, Einstein Discovery, and the Einstein Platform).', 'Working knowledge with data modeling and analysis to conduct ad-hoc analysis on large sets of data using various tools like Salesforce Einstein Analytics, R, Python etc. and provide results/findings/insights to the business owners or management team.', 'Hands-on configuration of all new and existing Salesforce.com features including user management, security, custom objects, page layouts, validations, workflows, flows, process builders, Einstein Analytics, and other 3rd party applications.', 'Must have Hands on Deployment experience & Lightning development experience', 'Experience with CRM data and reporting needs', 'Significant experience implementing web analytics tools using Google Tag Manager', 'Experience administering and working with GA360 in an enterprise or multi-domain environment', 'Expert-level knowledge of capabilities of GA360 and GTM', 'Deep understanding of the underlying data structures and their implications in GA360', 'Strong knowledge of current best practices and standards in web analytics implementation to provide direction to web site developers on tagging and tracking parameter methods', 'Experience working with Javascript in a tag management and web analytics context is required', 'Experience working with granular clickstream data is a plus', 'Experience working with mobile web technologies including JavaScript, HTML, AJAX, CSS, JSON, etc.', 'Experience with programming languages and scripting tools like Python, C++, R, JavaSript, JSON etc.', 'Experience with databases and writing SQL (Oracle, MySQL, SAQL etc ).', 'Design UX background (Prefer experience in XMD UI visualization).', 'Experience in connecting with multiple data connectors.', 'Experience in working with other data visualization tools such as Tableau.', 'Advanced Excel skills', 'Passion for data, reporting, and visualization and new technologies and tools', 'Must be a self-starter and able to research to develop solutions', 'A team-player with a positive attitude and flexible working style', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills; ability to communicate with all levels of management', 'Ability to ask the right questions to understand the business problem and identify the measurement or business objective']

['Serve as a trusted advisor, leading conversations with our customers’ architects, analysts and business users armed with best practices for analytics.', 'Advise and support diverse teams, which include customer, partner and internal resources in technical and functional delivery aspects.', 'Develop and provide guidance on implementation best practices.', 'Review and correct project direction, approach and key artifacts to keep programs on track and solutions extensible and maintainable going forward.', 'Certification in Salesforce Analytics Advanced Certification.(Highly preferred)', 'Working with Business Intelligence and data mining tools to perform insights analysis on varied data (E.g. Tableau, Salesforce Einstein Analytics, Microsoft Power BI).', 'Preparing data for analysis through data manipulation, data wrangling or ETL.', 'Working knowledge of BI/data warehouse functionality (preferred).', 'Working knowledge of databases and SQL.', 'Visualizing data to communicate insights.']

Should be capable of creating datasets, SAQL queries, reports, and dashboards', 'Einstein Analytics certification preferred', '3+ years’ Experience using a data analytics and visualization platforms, preferably utilizing Tableau', 'Experience in architecting, designing, developing BI and other analytical, reporting solutions using standard BI tools', 'Solid understanding of big data analytics and data warehouses/data marts (including data extraction techniques / ETL)', 'Experience with data mining tools (R/SAS/Python) and techniques for quantitative analysis, not required but a plus', 'Proven track record of delivering quality solutions to clients', 'Has strong verbal and written communication skills', 'Ability to work independently with minimal supervision']

May participate in business strategy discussions based proven/observed expertise.', 'Performs other related duties as assigned.', '8+ years experience in business systems analysis or like technical role', 'Intermediate to advanced knowledge of Salesforce Sales Cloud or Service Cloud', 'Intermediate knowledge of business workflows across multiple functional areas', 'Demonstrates an ability to lead moderately scoped projects from a business and systems analysis perspective', 'Demonstrates an ability to consult with stakeholders; may do so at senior levels', 'Applies knowledge of project management, group facilitation, and consultation', 'Applies knowledge of business needs assessment and analysis, and management principles and practices', 'Responsibilities include diverse tasks that may include creating all levels of deliverables, assisting with policy and procedure development, training, conducting business needs assessment, research and analysis, project planning, may act as consultation to senior management', 'Demonstrates willingness to learn and actively pursues higher level knowledge', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience required"]

job_title: Revenue Operations Specialist with Salesforce Einstein
job_text: ['Improve Customer Success and Sales team efficiency, productivity, and goal attainment', 'Be a trusted business partner to sales & marketing leadership', 'Develop reports, dashboards and analytics to help track key performance indicators, integrated across Finance, Sales, and Marketing, to ensure that business processes and systems are generating accurate data', 'Assist in preparation of weekly forecast and pipeline management reports', 'Support day-to-day inquiries from the sales team, providing prompt and efficient resolution to a wide range of issues', 'Collaborate cross-functionally within the sales, marketing, and finance organizations to ensure consistent reporting standards and processes', 'Experience with Einstein Analytics needed', 'Proficient Excel, MS Word, Outlook, PowerPoint.', 'Ability to multi-task and prioritize competing deadlines.', 'Ability to work well with others.', 'Ability to listen and communicate well both verbally and in writing.', 'Ability to work independently.', 'Attention to detail and accuracy.', 'Monday to Friday', 'Varies']

job_title: Solution Engineer - East - Retail and Consumer Goods
job_text: ['Become an expert in the features, benefits and application of Tableau as a platform. Gain an understanding of Salesforce Einstein.', 'Arranges and conducts face-to-face and web-based meetings as necessary to support presales activities (e.g., discovery, requirements analysis, presentation/demonstration, etc.) with customers and prospects.', 'Develops and delivers outstanding Tableau presentations and product demonstrations that range from standard to custom. Use Tableau’s products to quickly and expertly generate compelling, interactive visualizations using Tableau and Tableau Prep', 'Implements the Tableau platform for Guided Evaluations and Proof-of-Concepts (POC) scenarios where customers evaluate in an on-premise or cloud development environment. Supports off-site or on-site Guided Evaluations and POCs utilizing Tableau software to address the customer’s business issue(s) of moderate to extremely complex scope with customer provided or mocked-up data. As a part of this process, responsible as the Primary solution engineer formulating and leading all aspects of the technical sales process and identifying other presales resources required for the deliverables and ensuring customer satisfaction. Exercises independent judgment in methods, techniques and evaluation criteria of obtaining results. Creates formal networks involving coordination among groups.', 'Researches new technologies, tools and methodologies as they emerge that may be applicable.', 'Has an expert level knowledge of using analytics within the retail and/or consumer goods industries with compelling and innovative use cases.', 'Communicate daily with sales teams regarding sales activities and tactics to support our customers.', 'Be the customer advocate and liaison for product management and development', 'Support the sales team’s readiness in the use of Tableau products', 'Provide proactive support to customers and prospects', 'Backup the technical support staff as needed', '', 'Experienced. 5 or more years’ experience in a Sales Engineer/ Solution Engineer role, ideally in Enterprise accounts. This includes 3 or more years’ experience with business intelligence. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field preferred.', 'Highly Technical . Technical skill and/or ability to acquire in-depth knowledge/use of Tableau products to effectively position and convey the merits of the enterprise platform to customers and prospects. Proficiency in technologies complimentary to Tableau software such as the following: Enterprise software architectures, Salesforce, cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google), ETL (e.g., Informatica, Alteryx), SQL or MDX (e.g., MySQL, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, Redshift, Cloudera), .NET or JSP, Java, Linux, Windows, and network security/authentication + network and web infrastructure are a strong plus.', 'Data Rock Star. Demonstrated quantitative ability, such as statistics or analytics + experience with databases and data analysis tools that achieved quantifiable business value impact and positive outcomes.', 'Excellent Communication. Solid listening skills. Can quickly digest information and respond in an accurate and concise manner. Ability to respond appropriately to complex questions. Excellent written and oral communication skills to both business and technical audiences – solid presentation skills. Effectively gives and receives feedback. Effectively gains the trust of customers and prospects.', 'Problem Solver. Ability to solve problems with varying degrees of difficulty + analytical and strategic thinking skills.', 'Go Getter. Ability to work independently, multi-task and prioritize well in a fast paced, dynamic work environment + technical aggressiveness and ability to learn new technologies and business requirements.', 'Loves to learn and share . Actively challenges themself to learn new technologies including the Salesforce platform, new problem solving capabilities, and sales techniques. Will share knowledge and new learnings with solution engineering peers and customers.', 'You are a Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!']

['Collaborate and Partner with the Marketing teams in defining and documenting the use cases, translating the marketing strategy, business capabilities into technical strategy, capabilities and architecture. Create target state architecture, capability maturity roadmap and transition state architectures.', "Create and own future state solution architecture of the marketing technologies aligned with industry evolution and make recommendations to fit Pennymac's ecosystem.", 'You will proactively research , recommend , design technologies and industry best practice.', 'Ensure that individual technical solutions align with overall architectural vision', 'Craft guidance that helps delivery teams identify quality risk factors around security and compliance.', 'Effectively communicate complex technical solutions through excellent written and verbal skills to stakeholders.', 'You will develop technology roadmaps that consider both tactical and strategic direction, as well as factor in cost, user experience and security.', 'You will provide technical due diligence of software products and platforms.', '6+ years of information technology systems design and planning experience; in systems, applications, or architecture', '5+ years of experience designing software solutions using software architecture design principles', '5+ years of experience in application & integration architecture and patterns, Microservices and orchestration', '5+ years of experience in architecting and strategizing the digital marketing technology solutions', 'In-Depth understanding of the Digital Marketing landscape, Web technologies (AEM preferred) and experience with technologies like Web Analytics, Salesforce (FSC preferably, Einstein Analytics), Marketing Automation, Campaign Management, Search, MMP, Ad Servers, DMPs, DSPs, Audience Creation/Targeting, Salesforce Marketing cloud understanding', 'Experience driving technical workshops with technical and business stakeholders.', 'Provide leadership to technical resources, working with team members on suggested work assignments and leading team from design to solution', 'Partner with Vendor teams to collaborate and enforce solid architecture, design and technical implementation approach with enterprise technology need in mind']

job_title: Digital Marketing Technology Manager - NYC, Detroit, or Austin - Virtual, US
job_text: ['Collaborate with an array of cross-functional team members: Marketing, Sales and IT to connect the dots between our martech stack and continually optimize the customer journey', 'Be capable of operating strategically and executing tactically as you oversee the martech stack and associated integrations, own the marketing database, acquire contacts, maintain contact data health and integrity, nurture and deliver quality leads through best practice scoring and automation.', 'Serve as the admin and super user for our marketing automation platform and a variety of digital tools. Skillfully navigate and work in SalesForce from a marketing perspective. Troubleshoot and provide first line of support for marketing end users.', 'Create and maintain dynamic lists, automated lead scoring and routing rules. Design and develop marketing automation assets: forms, landing pages, email as needed to accelerate campaign launches.', 'Oversee data health and compliance with regional data privacy laws.', 'Collaborate with web and demand marketers to improve marketing campaign efficiency through continual measurement with a focus on optimizing conversion.', 'Coordinate global SEM/SEO efforts, monitor and manage Google analytics for web and campaign tracking.', 'Analyse and synthesize data from multiple sources into a cohesive view of historic and forecasted marketing performance. Design and deliver adhoc, weekly and monthly reports.', 'Manage and evolve multi-touch attribution and ROI models.', 'Lead integration and implementation of new marketing tech ensuring marketers are trained and adopt technology.', 'Manage relationships with technology vendors', '4 + years of marketing tech experience', '2+ years in B2B marketing for SaaS software, experience in the enterprise software market is ideal', 'Project management skills with the ability to multi-task and complete projects flawlessly under tight project deadlines without much supervision', 'Desire for working in a fast-paced start-up environment, comfort with change, and a willingness to roll up your sleeves and get the job done, whatever it takes', 'Experience with marketing automation platforms, Pardot preferred, certification a plus', 'Experience with customer relationship management platforms, Scom preferred', 'Experience with sales and marketing analytics, dashboard design and data visualization tools (Einstein preferred)', 'Experience with web analytics, website and content management platforms', 'Experience with data enrichment platforms and services']

job_title: Director, Data and Analytics - Behr Paint Company
job_text: ['Develop and execute the Data & Analytics strategy for the Pro Sales Channel, in part through partnership with various teams across BPC as well as channel partners (e.g., The Home Depot).', 'Lead in-depth rigorous end-to-end data and analytics projects (Define Data Structure and System requirements, Conduct Advanced Analytics & Validation, Distill Insights, Develop Recommendations, and support business implementation and impact measurement).', 'Identify currently available data sources and how to enrich them; strategize on new potential data sources and determine cost/benefit of acquiring or maintaining data.', 'Build and lead a team of data and business professionals to accelerate insights and impact within the Pro channel.', 'Develop and perpetually maintain Pro business intelligence reporting (e.g., Dashboards, KPIs) to measure pro performance and use reporting to identify opportunities to improve pro performance.', 'Develop compelling presentations and storytelling to present insights, recommendations and strategies.', 'Present and defend analyses to senior management.', 'Assist the SVP, Company Strategy & Pro Strategy Deployment and Analytics with analytics-related projects across Behr Paint Company.', 'Minimum of 7 years of experience leading teams of five plus data scientists, engineers, and other data & analytics professionals, including working knowledge of modeling (regression, machine learning, feature selection, dimension reduction, validation), data (extracting, preparing, munging, validating), and building analytics pipelines; Minimum of two years of training and experience specific to machine learning and/or artificial intelligence.', 'Proven experience developing and executing data and analytics strategies, not limited to securing data access, data maintenance, reporting (both ad hoc and perpetually refreshed), etc.', 'Strong knowledge in design and building of machine learning pipelines, including data extraction, feature engineering from structured and unstructured data; Proficiency in delivering analytics projects using leading processes including skilled knowledge of data discovery, cleaning, model selection, validation, and deployment.', 'Broad, versatile knowledge of analytics and data science landscape, combined with a strong business acumen, enabling the identification, design, and deployment of optimal analytics/machine learning solutions to meet the business objectives and the business constraints; Ability to discuss pros and cons of modeling approaches.', 'Proficiency with sophisticated analytics tools and programming languages (SAS, R, Python, Java, Spark, Hadoop, Alteryx, SQL); proficiency with data visualization tools (Tableau, QlikView, Salesforce Einstein, and others).', 'Hardware/ home improvement industry experience a plus.', 'Structured and logical thinking: the ability to dissect a problem into an organized approach and quickly form a hypothesis against which to run test analyses.', 'Analytical rigor: the ability to run highly complicated quantitative and financial analysis in a defect-free manner and to interpret the results and business implications. Comfort with regression analysis and machine learning is highly relevant.', 'Team leadership: Highly developed relationship-building skills to foster effective working relations across the Pro Sales Channel, IT, Sales Operations, Finance, Marketing, and other cross-functional peer relationships across BEHR Paint Company. Proven ability to identify talent, recruit, grow and manage a team of data and analytics professionals.', 'Creative thinking: a combination of out of the box thinking and the ability to question status quo and generally accepted beliefs. Then the ability to apply a strong hypothesis driven approach to validate and/or disprove the thinking using data.', 'Powerful communication: the ability to communicate insights persuasively, both verbally and on paper through the written words and clear graphics (e.g., charts, tables).', 'Emotional intelligence: The candidate must possess strong interpersonal skills and a high level of emotional intelligence to interact with BPC team members at all levels.', 'Considerable knowledge of data and analytics principles, frameworks, and methodologies across a broad range of structured and unstructured data types.', 'Considerable financial and operational modeling capabilities, including regression, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.', 'Deep knowledge of analytics tools and relevant programming languages.', 'Ability to lead teams of data and analytics professionals and ability to collaborate cross-functionally.', 'Knowledge of MS Office Suites and/or software applications related to function (particularly MS PPT, MS Excel, MS Word).', 'Ability to independently scope work using a hypothesis driven approach and validate with leadership.', 'Ability to independently plan, organize and complete projects as assigned.', 'Ability to delegate tasks and check work in progress and upon completion.', 'Ability to communicate effectively in a variety of environments.', 'Ability to inspect products and work results for adherence to quality standards.', 'Occasional travel out of state to attend internal or customer meetings, functions, seminars, etc.', 'TN #IND']

job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Partner with sales leaders to design go-to-market strategy, allocate resources, assign performance targets and more', 'Develop an effective plan to achieve Sales and Pipeline targets at all levels of sales leadership', 'Track key metrics such as pipeline, ACV, contract and product based analytic, top account and product performance', 'Uncover additional potential to sell and increase added ACV opportunities: White space analysis, Propensity to buy, Sales coverage by region Segment, territory strategy, etc.', 'Create executive presentations for Salesforce C-level audience', 'Manage and coordinate weekly sales forecast', 'Construct and automate dashboards for key performance metrics', 'Build sales tools, such as propensity to buy analysis', 'Perform ad hoc analysis across multiple data sets, including Salesforce, product databases, & more', 'Assist in developing and delivering presentations for leadership including board and QBR meetings', '5+years relevant experience including any of the following: Territory Mapping, Identifying Pipeline Hotspots, TAM (Total Addressable Market), Understanding of Performance KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)', 'Work experience with deep management consulting and/or Sales strategy & operations background', 'Tableau experience', 'Solid Sales Performance Management experience', 'Exceptional executive presence and communication skills', 'Strategic, Quantitative and Operational mindset with strong strategy consulting background', 'Proven ability to lead large teams and complex cross functional projects', 'Einstein experience a plus']
